subsections.title: Basic Concepts (Calling CQ, etc.)
subsections.label: subsec:basics-calling
prompts: Explain the concept of 'Calling CQ' in amateur radio operations, including its purpose and typical usage scenarios.
Describe the importance of operating etiquette in amateur radio, focusing on how it ensures smooth communication and mutual respect among operators.
Outline the standard procedures followed during amateur radio operations, emphasizing the steps taken to establish and maintain communication.
